patthana23.8:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.8:5.1: Nakusalaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.8:6.1: Nakusalaṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.8:6.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … sahajāte nava … pe … nissaye nava … pe … kamme … pe … magge nava … pe … avigate nava.
